item.title: 常用快捷键
item.description: iterm 1 2 3 4 command <- -> 左右切换 command t new tab command w close command q quit chrome command shift n – incognito command w close command option 左右键 command shift w close window [man 命令的名称] 可以查看命令的详细用法 1 2 man htop man ls 切换 app control +

item.title: typescript中const用法
item.description: 索引访问类型 Indexed Access Types 常量断言 const assertions 数组转 type 1 2 3 4 5 const animals = ['cat', 'dog', 'mouse'] as const // const animals: readonly ['cat', 'dog', 'mouse'] type Animal = typeof animals[number] // type Animal = 'cat' | 'dog' | 'mouse' 数组对象转 type 1 2 3 4 5 const animals = [ { species:
